Package it.uniroma1.mdp.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.uniroma1.mdp.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullGame, SingleGame
public abstract class Game extends Object
Abstract class representing a card game. Manages the number of players, game table, and game status.
